title: I can't set just my home screen wallpaper when I have a live wallpaper set to the lockscreen.
content:
I have the tiktok app downloaded and this has an extension which allows me to set live photos/videos as wallpapers. I have this currently on as I want a live photo set for my lockscreen but when I set the live photo for my lockscreen, it makes it that I have to either put it for both my home screen and lockscreen or just the homescreen.

So I selected set both and then tried to change my home screen to a different photo but when I try to set a different photo for my home screen, the only options are either home screen and lockscreen or just lockscreen. 

What I want is the live photo on my lockscreen and a still photo on my home screen. Please help me.
category: Setting up and Personalizing your Device, Google Pixel 3a
